content.raw:
Given only one force axis, my preference would be the foot frame.

However!  This is a BDI question.   It shouldn't matter what we prefer, this should be one or the other in order to match what BDI will be reporting out of their sensor.

Please. This needs to be determined ASAP, and a patch pushed out as part of the general deb package release.
content.html:
Given only one force axis, my preference would be the foot frame.

However! This is a BDI question. It shouldn't matter what we prefer, this should be one or the other in order to match what BDI will be reporting out of their sensor.

Please. This needs to be determined ASAP, and a patch pushed out as part of the general deb package release.
